testsuite.name: cs.home.shopping.service.CartServiceTest

testcase.name: (ALL) when a regular Customer adds 3 shirts to cart then total should be 71.98
(ALL) when a regular Customer adds 2 shirts and 2 jeans to cart then total should be 166.99
(ALL) when a VIP Customer adds 3 dresses to cart then total should be 161.50
(ALL) when a VIP Customer adds 2 jeans and 2 dresses to cart then total should be 227.00
(ALL) when a VIP Customer adds 4 shirts and 1 jeans to cart then total should be 173.47
(S1) when a regular Customer adds 3 shirts to cart then total should be 71.98
when adding 1 items of Product 1 with vipUSER equals true then the discount should be true
when adding 3 items of Product 2 with vipUSER equals true then the discount should be true
when removing 1 items of Product 1 then result should be true
when removing 3 items of Product 2 then result should be true
when Products has 1 items and Customer is not VIP then Discount should be 0
when Products has 2 items and Customer is not VIP then Discount should be 0
when Products has 3 items and Customer is not VIP then Discount should be 100
when adding a product that was already added then increase quantity
